comment._content: Again, not Proviso Yard and therefore in Chicago rather than Melrose Park.

comment.author: 8623220@N02
comment._content: iris.schimandle: Thanks for the correction! We've updated all 19 affected records in our own catalog ( http://www.loc.gov/rr/print/catalog.html), and the information will be updated in Flickr soon, too. (4/25/08)
